mapper.select: select id,plan_id,template_id,render_pic,render_720,render_n720,render_video, is_deleted,state,remark,fail_type,fail_reason,host_name,business_id,design_plan_id,task_id from auto_render_task_state where 1 = 1 and plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id,plan_id,template_id,render_pic,render_720,render_n720,render_video, is_deleted,state,remark,fail_type,fail_reason,host_name,business_id,design_plan_id,task_id from auto_render_task_state where template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_deleted = 0 and fail_type is null order by id desc
mapper.insert:
insert into auto_render_task
plan_id, template_id, priority, space_code, operation_user_id, operation_user_name, order_number, render_types_str, task_type, operation_source, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, task_source, design_code, design_name, host_ip, template_code, render_pic, render_720, render_n720, render_video,
#{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spaceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renderTypesStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{designCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renderPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{render720,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renderN720,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renderVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

select
from auto_render_task where 1=1 and is_deleted = 0 and task_type = 1 order by priority desc LIMIT 0, #{autoRenderTask.maxSize}

from auto_render_task where 1=1 and is_deleted = 0 order by priority desc
mapper.update:
update auto_render_task_state set
is_valid = 1 where 1 = 1 AND business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,plan_id,template_id,render_pic,render_720,render_n720,render_video, is_deleted,state,remark,fail_type,fail_reason,host_name,business_id,design_plan_id,task_id,order_number ,operation_user_id,task_type,render_types_str,gmt_create,gmt_modified,modifier,creator from auto_render_task_state where is_deleted = 0 and business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id,plan_id,template_id,render_pic,render_720,render_n720,render_video, is_deleted,state,remark,fail_type,fail_reason,host_name,business_id,design_plan_id,task_id,order_number ,operation_user_id,task_type,render_types_str,gmt_create,gmt_modified,modifier,creator from auto_render_task_state where is_deleted = 0 and is_valid = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
